attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My insurance company wanted almost £200 to cancel my car insurance!

I was looking at changing my car insurance over to a new company that was cheaper (£400 cheaper) but offered the same level of cover. However, because I wanted to cancel my insurance before the renewal date, my existing insurance company demanded I pay a months premium and the cost of the remaining days left in the month. In my case this meant that I would have to pay almost £200 JUST TO CANCEL MY CAR INSURANCE even though I only had 3 months left before it was due for renewal and I have been with them for many years.
So instead of having a set cancellation fee they base the fee on your premium. Pitty those with expensive premiums!!!!
I would not have a problem if they said I had to pay an administration fee of £15 maybe even £20 as I appreciate it takes time to cancel and time is money.

Needless to say I resent paying them that amount of money and will be waiting till my insurance is up for renewal.
